directions: Combine diced mango, yogurt, 1 cup ice cubes, milk, honey, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, and ground cardamom in blender. Puree until smooth. Pour smoothie into 2 glasses. Garnish each glass with mango wedge and serve.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups diced peeled pitted mango (about 1 1/2 large)
title: Spiced Mango Lassi
